text: The moment had come. Upon the ensuing interview the future would depend. Out-wardly she was calm, but her heart was beating fast, and the palms of her hands were damp. Orsini's high-crowned hat with its jaunty plume blotted out the light; his hand was on the door. Glancing at Lucia he said in French to Vittoria: 'Your maid .. is she reliable?' The moment had come. name: Vittoria
